name: HaramAzan
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haram azan
des:
Haram Azan, You can set this as Fajar Awakening Alarm. It will call automatic on your given set time.
Process. 
1) Just go in Routine menu, create new routine at Fajar manual schedule.
2) Add action below, and click on skill. Select "Haram Azan" and click next,
3) You can also add other actions like open room lights as well ( Create Scenario ).
4) Click save.
5) Now, at your specific Fajar set time. your Room lights will turn on and start Haram Soothing Fajar Azan.

Note: Extra action depends on your mood, but when all lights off, then hard to wake up.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
